title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 March 2015 - XWiki

13:44 <vmassol> tmortagne, mflorea: ok for WebRss in activitystream-ui (cf last mail I sent)? I'm almost ready to commit  
13:44 <vmassol> it makes sense to me but I'd like to have at least one other agreing :)  
13:45 <vmassol> (forgot Enygma` :)  
13:45 <vmassol> )  
13:45 <vmassol> who's not sure…  
13:45 <vmassol> reading  
13:47 <vmassol> Enygma`: just replied

17:47 <vmassol> hmm I couldn't find any documentation for the share page feature on xwiki.org....  
17:47 <vmassol> if someone knows of any please let me know
